SEARCH
Package org.jarzarr.ui.widgets

Class Label

java.lang.Object
org.jarzarr.ui.UINode
org.jarzarr.ui.widgets.Label
public final class Label extends UINode
Non-interactive text label with optional autosizing and alignment.

Autosizing:

  • If autoSize=true, the label measures text and sets prefW/prefH (unless the user explicitly provided width/height/pref sizes).

Alignment is applied within the label's inner content rect (after padding).
